meanings.sent1: I rereviewed my homework to check for mistakes.
meanings.sent2: She rereviewed the notes before the exam.
meanings.sent3: The detective rereviewed the case and found a new clue.
meanings.sent4: He rereviewed his life choices after a moment of reflection.
meanings.sent5: Rereviewed documents can help catch errors.
